options.content: INTEND 5G4Data Intent Dashboard â€” ${datacenter}

targets.queryText:
PREFIX log: <http://tio.models.tmforum.org/tio/v3.6.0/LogicalOperators/>
PREFIX icm: <http://tio.models.tmforum.org/tio/v3.6.0/IntentCommonModel/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX data5g: <http://5g4data.eu/5g4data#>
PREFIX set: <http://tio.models.tmforum.org/tio/v3.6.0/SetOperators/>
PREFIX quan: <http://tio.models.tmforum.org/tio/v3.6.0/QuantityOntology/>

SELECT DISTINCT
  (STRAFTER(STR(?intent), "5g4data#") AS ?intent_id)
  (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?description; separator="; ") AS ?intent_description)
  (CONCAT(
     "http://start5g-1.cs.uit.no:3001/d/fekk4b61d38qof/intent-and-condition-metrics-timeseries-dashboard?var-intent_id=",
     STRAFTER(STR(?intent), "5g4data#"),
     "&var-condition_metrics=",
     GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT REPLACE(REPLACE(STR(?metric), ".*#", ""), "-", "_"); separator=",")
   ) AS ?intent_link)
  (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?condition_description; separator="; ") AS ?condition_descriptions)
WHERE {
  SERVICE <repository:intents_and_intent_reports> {
    # Use the same pattern as the working panel for descriptions
    ?intent rdf:type ?intentType ;
            log:allOf ?expectation .

    ?expectation rdf:type ?expectationType ;
                 dct:description ?description .

    OPTIONAL {
      ?expectation log:allOf ?condition .
      ?condition rdf:type icm:Condition .
      OPTIONAL { ?condition set:forAll [ icm:valuesOfTargetProperty ?metric ] . }
      OPTIONAL { ?condition dct:description ?condition_description . }
    }

    FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?expectationType), "Expectation"))

    # Restrict to intents that have a Context with the chosen datacenter
    FILTER EXISTS {
      ?intent ?op1 ?expOrCtx .
      FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?op1), STR(log:)))              # any logical edge from the intent
      ?expOrCtx ?op2 ?context .
      FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?op2), STR(log:)))              # any logical edge to a context
      ?context a icm:Context ;
               data5g:DataCenter ?dc .

      # Normalize dashboard var (EC_21 -> EC21) to match stored values
      BIND(REPLACE("${datacenter}", "_", "") AS ?dcParam)
      FILTER(STR(?dc) = ?dcParam)
    }
  }
}
GROUP BY ?intent
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Intent Details for ${datacenter} (up to 10 latest, only if state reported, state based on state report)
